flawed_nl_solution:
On Sunday he takes 2 hours to get there because 4 / 2 = <<4/2=2>>2
This takes him 120 minutes because 2 x 60 = <<2*60=120>>120
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 4 hours to get to the store because 4 / 10 = <<4/10=4>>4
On Tuesday and Thursday, it takes him 240 minutes to get to the store because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=240>>240
In total it takes him 600 minutes to get to the store because 120 + 240 + 240 = <<120+240+240=600>>600
On average it takes him 200 minutes because 600 / 3 = <<600/3=200>>200
#### 200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.4, not 4. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
